```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(stringr)
library(themebg)

data_clin <- readRDS("../data/tidy/resident_clinical.Rds")

x.text <- element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 6)
```

```{r}
data_clin %>%
    mutate_at("resident", fct_infreq) %>%
    mutate_at("resident", fct_rev) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = resident)) +
    geom_bar() +
    coord_flip() +
    theme_bg() 
```
